ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Adamantium
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in adamantium, an extremely rare mineral found deep underground, though surface nodes also exist. Adamantium is roughly plasteel tier, and while it is outclassed by both ebony and glass, it is worth significantly more. Also included is blessed adamantium, which can be rarely obtained by traders.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Includes a patch that adds adamantium to Empire (Royalty) traders.
-Includes a patch that makes High Ordinator armour from Dunmer Factions Medieval Edition craftable, using adamantium and blessed adamantium.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
